Class QuantumHarmonicOscillator

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.physics.quantum.QuantumHarmonicOscillator
public class QuantumHarmonicOscillator extends Object
Quantum Harmonic Oscillator calculations.

    • HBAR

      public static final double HBAR
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • energyLevel

      public static double energyLevel(int n, double omega)
      Energy eigenvalues. E_n = ℏω(n + 1/2)
      Parameters:
      n - Quantum number (0, 1, 2, ...)
      omega - Angular frequency (rad/s)
      Returns:
      Energy in Joules

    • angularFrequency

      public static double angularFrequency(double springConstant, double mass)
      Angular frequency from spring constant and mass. ω = sqrt(k/m)

    • groundStateEnergy

      public static double groundStateEnergy(double omega)
      Ground state energy. E_0 = ℏω/2

    • transitionEnergy

      public static double transitionEnergy(int n1, int n2, double omega)
      Transition energy between levels. ΔE = ℏω (for adjacent levels)

    • classicalAmplitude

      public static double classicalAmplitude(double energy, double mass, double omega)
      Classical amplitude for given energy. A = sqrt(2E/(mω²))

    • groundStateProbabilityAt0

      public static double groundStateProbabilityAt0(double mass, double omega)
      Probability density at x=0 for ground state. |ψ_0(0)|² = sqrt(mω/(πℏ))

    • zeroPointMotion

      public static double zeroPointMotion(double mass, double omega)
      Zero-point motion (uncertainty in position). Δx_0 = sqrt(ℏ/(2mω))
